bug.author: kurmanadhvalla
bug.summary: TensorFlow Pascal VOC XML generation in v2
bug.description: Describe the bug Generated XML do not have info about bounding boxes in v2 To Reproduce Export in TensorFlow Pascal VOC format in v2 Expected behavior Generated xml should have bounding boxes data Screenshots If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Platform [ ] Electron [ ] Browser OS [ ] Windows [ ] Mac [ ] Linux Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment: Thank you <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kurmanadhvalla>@kurmanadhvalla</denchmark-link> . Yes this is a regression bug. We're investigating on this and planning for a fix.
This issue has been resolved and will be included in upcoming release this week.
